stances-text-u: (只有在衝突期間可以擺出架式)
air-stance-text-u: 對你所進行的攻擊和計策檢定 TN +1 (等級 4 以上 +2)。
earth-stance-text-u: 他人無法花費機運來對你造成致命一擊或施加狀態。
fire-stance-text-u: 若檢定成功，每有一個矛盾圖示都可以額外 +1。
water-stance-text-u: 在你的回合進行另一個不需要檢定或與你第一個動作類型相同的動作。
void-stance-text-u: 你在檢定時不會因矛盾圖示而獲得矛盾值。
ring-restricitons-u: 最大值 = 空 + 最低輪
technique-restricitons-u: 按照流派和招式條件而定
exp-spent-rank-1-u: 在 1 級課程中花費的 XP
exp-spent-rank-2-u: 在 2 級課程中花費的 XP
exp-spent-rank-3-u: 在 3 級課程中花費的 XP
exp-spent-rank-4-u: 在 4 級課程中花費的 XP
exp-spent-rank-5-u: 在 5 級課程中花費的 XP
exp-spent-outside-school-u: 在流派課程外花費的 XP 為原有的一半
total-exp-spent-rank-1-u: 在 1 級課程中花費的總 XP (20)
total-exp-spent-rank-2-u: 在 2 級課程中花費的總 XP (24)
total-exp-spent-rank-3-u: 在 3 級課程中花費的總 XP (32)
total-exp-spent-rank-4-u: 在 4 級課程中花費的總 XP (44)
total-exp-spent-rank-5-u: 在 5 級課程中花費的總 XP (60)
total-exp-spent-title-u: 在頭銜中花費的總 XP
roll-explosive-dice-u: 若大成功，點角卡上的「擲輪/技能骰」按鈕來額外擲骰
part-1-u: 第一部分: 核心身分 (氏族與家族)
part-2-u: 第二部分: 職位與流派
part-3-u: 第三部分: 名譽與榮耀
part-4-u: 第四部分: 強項與弱項
part-5-u: 第五部分: 個性與行為舉止
part-6-u: 第六部分: 祖先與家族
part-8-u: 第八部分: 創建角色
question-1-u: 你的角色屬於哪個氏族？(p. 41)
question-2-u: 你的角色屬於哪個家族？(p. 49)
question-3-u: 你的角色學習什麼流派，該流派屬於什麼職位？(p. 56)
question-4-u: How does your character stand out within their school? (p. 88)
question-5-u: Who is your lord and what is your character’s duty to them? (Select Giri) (p. 88)
question-6-u: What does your character long for, and how might this impede their duty? (Select Ninjō) (p. 90)
question-7-u: What is your character’s relationship with their clan? (p. 91)
question-8-u: What does your character think of Bushidō? (p. 91)
question-9-u: What is your character’s greatest accomplishment so far? (p. 92)
question-10-u: What holds your character back the most in life? (p. 92)
question-11-u: What activity most makes your character feel at peace? (p. 92)
question-12-u: What concern, fear, or foible troubles your character the most? (p. 93)
question-13-u: Who has your character learned the most from during their life? (p. 93)
question-14-u: What do people notice first upon encountering your character? (p. 93)
question-15-u: How does your character react to stressful situations? (p. 94)
question-16-u: What are your character’s preexisting relationships with other clans, families, organizations, and traditions? (p. 94)
question-17-u: How would your character’s parents describe them? (p. 95)
question-18-u: Who was your character named to honour? (p. 95)
question-19-u: What is your character’s personal name? (p. 95)
20-qs-description-u: You can use this to keep your notes of the twenty questions. The questions are found in the Core Rulebook with more detailed information (L5R RPG Core Rulebook, Chapter 2: Creating a Character p. 41–95)
20-qs-auto-generated-text-u: At the end of this sheet there is a generate button that will fill in fields on the sheet. This will overwrite any earlier inputs, so use with care.
20-qs-generate-u: Click to generate your character. Will overwrite earlier inputs in the sheet
this-is-how-you-should-die-u: This is how you should die
